item.title: CVE-2023-45767|2024-08-02T20:29:32.377Z -- wokamoto -- simple%20tweet
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Wokamoto Simple Tweet plugin <=Â 1.4.0.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-0700|2024-06-04T17:59:08.852Z -- wokamoto -- simple%20tweet
item.description: The Simple Tweet plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the Tweet this text value in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.0.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-0700|2024-08-01T18:11:35.720Z -- wokamoto -- simple%20tweet
item.description: The Simple Tweet plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the Tweet this text value in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.0.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
